Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprite
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CrackedWall, Door, Explosion, Floor, Moveable, Switch, Target, Wall

    public class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one sprite on the screen
